title: ADC Viability
body: how viable is mf as a adc at the moment

replies.body:
1. Black Cleaver takes a while to become 100% useful. True MF can proc it a bit quicker but generally you want to have full damage from the first AA.

2. The current ADC build is in a perfect spot. It gives everything the ADC needs with a few different options viable for different Champs and enemy team comps, if you're gonna build a Black Cleaver what exactly would you be trading off? Something really important

3. You will generally be a massive bulk of the team's AD damage, unless you have an AD Assassin on your team in which case they will have a tonne of Armpen themselves so no need to to worry. If you're building Cleaver because of a REALLY heavy AD comp then that could work but if you're just building it every single game for yourself, Last Whisper works better for that.

I always play MF and I think she's absolutely fine. I've gotten first blood by hitting my Q's , and the attack speed on her W is amazing for pushing down towers and getting objectives quickly.
Plus dat ult. 

I never build Black Cleaver on her though. I go for the standard ADC build and it works just fine. My damage in lane isn't a problem either - I've definitely won some difficult match ups (i.e. cait)

She's not as highly picked as other ADCs, but if you know how to play her, it's rewarding

A lot of people don't know how to play MF (including myself) to her full ability because no one plays her, so there are no pros to watch and learn how to play her properly. If then enemy doesn't have a Jarvan or Amumu (gap closer+CC chain) then she can be fine.

But really, if you play an ADC that doesn't have a dash ability you automatically putting yourself at a disadvantage.

If you are not playing in higher elo bracket, she is definitely viable as an adc if you can make it.

Overall, she isn't the best adc around but that doesn't mean you should only play the fotm meta top picks, if you like MF I don't see why you can't play her. Just in high elo where most people know the game like the back of their hands, it's not good picking MF, other than that it's all possible.
Play her as jungle. You won't be impressed.
